version.js: var versions = []; for(var i = 0 ; i < document.getElementsByTagName("a").length; i++) { versions.push(document.getElementsByTagName("a")[i].attributes[0].value); }; versions = versions.filter(function(e) { return !e.startsWith('?') && e.endsWith("/"); }).map(function(e) { return e.replace(/\//g, ''); }); return JSON.stringify(versions);
